message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a deal, but I have to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $135? It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $125? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'd like to get as close to my budget as possible.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. How about we meet at $130? It's a bit higher than your original offer, but I'm still willing to negotiate.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $128, but that's as high as I can go. I really want to make this deal work.

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $129? It's just a small increase from your offer, but I think it's still a fair price for the product.
I'm getting close to my limit, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $128, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher. Can you meet me at that price?
